name: Mummy Candies
description:
Mummy Candies – this is a great game with very beautiful graphics and music. The goal of the game is to collect all the candies and lollipops for the mummy, also beware of explosive pumpkins, you can improve your achievements with the help of shopping in the store. This game has 20 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity.

The game has:
- A shop where you can buy items with the money you earn.
- Items that can be used in levels
- Pleasant music

The goal of the game is to collect a certain amount of candies in a round. The mummy is very fond of sweets, and you will have little time, so hurry up!
You can collect sweets for more points than you need in a round. Then the points can be spent in the shop before the start of the round. This will help you through the next round.
